product_name: The North Face Nimble Vest - Men's
long_description: The North Face Nimble Vest for men is a wind-resistant soft shell top designed for highly aerobic endeavors. Polyester/spandex fabric breathes, resists wind and moves freely. Durable water repellent finish helps bead up light rain so it rolls off. Elastic-bound hem, collar and arm openings move comfortably. The North Face Nimble Vest for men features a zippered Napoleon pocket and zippered hand pockets.
short_description: The North Face Nimble Vest for men is a wind-resistant soft shell top designed for highly aerobic endeavors.
